entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasm][windows][aot] `emcc` fails to download `zlib` on rolling build, causing tests to fail #62553
  • [wasm][debugger][tests] `DebuggerTests.MiscTests.GetSourceUsingSourceLink` failing #62551
  • [Android] Out of memory crashes in System.Security.Cryptography tests #62547
  • Metadata for type 'CLASS' was not provided to the serializer, but it was. #62546
  • Check build.cmd arguments before we start doing actual work #62535
    Future
  • IHttpClientFactory cannot be injected into ILoggerProvider #62531
    Future
  • How to change the ComHost Server registry name? #62529
  • `GetSystemTimeZones()` produces different results whether `FindSystemTimeZoneById()` has been called previous or not #62527
  • Change the `cpu-usage` EventCounter from int to double #62525
  • Forward substitution for relops misses `LCL_FLD` uses #62524
    7.0.0
  • IConfiguration binding behave unexpectedly when binding empty strings from nested configurations #62532
  • Assembly.Load will throw System.IO.FileNotFoundException #62522
  • System.Runtime.Caching.MemoryCache does not evict on NET 3.1/5/6 #62516
  • [Linux] procfs file reads and UnauthorizedAccessException handling #62513
  • Move corerun to src/native/hosts/ #62512
    Future
  • ChainedConfigurationProvider.GetChildKeys is inefficient #62510

Closed

  • WASM - Little/No Documentation for Using Low-Level Javascript Interop APIs #62530
  • Device unauthorized errors during Android device CI runs #47185
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Logging Source Generator - implicitly set LogLevel based on method name decorated by LoggerMessageAttribute #62412
  • [API Proposal]: `DateOnly` and `TimeOnly` `MinValue` and `MaxValue` should be fields like in `DateTime` and similar #62533
  • Can .NET 5 run exe targeting .Net Framework? #62521
  • Blazor WASM - deserialization exception with ImmutableList when the app is published #62242
  • While waiting for a TaskCompletionSource.Task, execution continues on the thread where the result was set #62523
  • System.IO errors: The process cannot access the file ... #60521
    7.0.0
  • System.Reflection.MethodInfo.CreateDelegate<T> method failing with System.ArgumentException #62366
  • CultureInfo enum #62511
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve loop JitDump output #62556
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Store string-builder as a field and clear when reuse + IndexOfAny #62552
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Pipeline caching proof of concept #62550
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW
  • [tests] Fix local test runs for mobile #62549
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix createdump failure on MacOS Monterey version 12.0.1. #62548
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Make tests pass on AVX only host again #62544
    community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] View object attributes - DebugType=full #62543
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono
  • Using ReadOnlySpan<char> on SymbolicRegexRunner #62542
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Enforce HTTP request Content-Length correctness #62541
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Removing trailing dot from a SNI host in TLS #62540
    area-System.Net.Security
  • More regex source generator tweaks #62539
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Backport all CI matrix changes from 7.0 to reelase/6.0 #62538
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Disable test BasicTestWithMcj for CG2 with #60381 #62537
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Introduce automation rules for PR workflows #62534
    area-Infrastructure
  • Dedup addprefix & delete unused defines from cmake #62528
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0-maui] Backport MacCatalyst process start support #62520
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Don't create multiple large files at the same time #62519
    area-System.IO, test enhancement
  • Skip source gen DLLs in mono AOT #62518

Merged

  • Update build pool to macOS 11 #62294
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Disable tests on Mac Catalyst in App Sandbox mode #62536
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [TODO-List-Cleanup] `gtHasRef` refactoring #62526
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Integration of changes in shared files from runtimelab/NativeAOT #62515
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Enable memory-mapped stress log on cross platform #61123
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix createdump failure on MacOS Monterey version 12.0.1 #62465
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: refactor arm64 epilog generation #62381
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete `gtEvalSizeFirst` #62330
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Port changes from 6.0 for future servicing releases into main #62469
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 6.0.2 #62493
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 5.0.14 #62492
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • CI matrix: add openSUSE 15.2 - second attempt #60161
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Mark static boxes as invariant #62298
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Fix and optimize llvmonly+gsharedvt code generation #61117
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Optimize ReadOnlyTernaryTree for System.Private.Xml #60076
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • S.IO.StringReader: Use ReadOnlySpan.IndexOfAny in ReadLine() for performance #60463
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] View object attributes - DebugType=full #62278
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Unblock tests in LINQ interpreter only mode #62463
    area-System.Dynamic.Runtime
  • Enable max warnlevel from C# compiler #62506
  • Convert TryGetRawMetadata comment to XML documentation #61515
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Disable DispatchProxyTests.Test_Unloadability on Mono #62504
    area-System.Reflection
  • Add Runtime portion of android startup scenario #61861

Updated

  • Convert some old style intrinsics to NamedIntrinsic #62271
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use "pipeline-caching" for coreclr and libraries builds #62464
  • Wasm marshaler API for user-defined types; migrate Uri and DateTime to new API #47640
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono
  • PE loader/image investigations #61938
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • Enable QJFL and OSR by default for x64 #61934
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Switch over miscellaneous DllImports to GeneratedDllImport. #62353
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Change all "unmanaged" (no GC fields) sequential types to have sequential layout. #61759
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add almalinux support #62184
    area-Host
  • Escape lower-cased type names #62507
    area-Meta
  • Expose Comment in ZipArchive and ZipArchiveEntry #59442
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [build] Create clr.host subset to remove patching step for mono runtime tests #62500
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix AddEventLog: EventLogSettings not added #57567
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, Future
  • Fix XmlSchema does not correctly validate xs:NMTOKENS type restrictions with enumeration #60544
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Port MD4 managed implementation from mono/mono #62074
    area-System.Security
  • CI matrix update: add Ubuntu 21.04 - second attempt #60162
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • CI matrix change: Add OSX 12 arm #59085
    blocked, area-Infrastructure
  • Mark overflow fix for regions #60646
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [tests][mobile] Enable diagnostic_tracing for mobile runtime tests #60879
  • [wasm] Reduce number of calls to setTimer #62433
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 6.0.x
  • Add Match and isMatch ReadOnlySpan<char> overloads as well as Regex protected methods which expose ReadOnlySpan<char> to avoid allocations. #62509
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/6.0] Fix re-initialization of hash objects on CNG. #62403
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security
  • Fix a case of hang while allocating at LOH boundary #62355
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Initial changes for emscripten 2.0.34 #62499
    area-Build-mono
  • Add RegexGenerator to System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter. #62325
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Use await on task when waiting for tests to complete #62501
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • Support for devirtualizing array interface methods #62497
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • CI matrix change: Windows #58989
    area-Infrastructure
  • CI matrix: Add windows 20H2 - fix TLS1.3 issue #62435
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add zlib-ng library, optimized for ARM64 #61883
    area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.0
  • Remove string allocation from XmlTextEncoder.WriteCharEntity #61774
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Add ConstantExpectedAttribute #62436
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Including FastFloat in parsing process #62301
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Rewrite XslNumber.ConvertToDecimal #55868
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Improve inliner - static readonly fields, pinvokes, Span::Length #62421
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP]: Fix broken callstacks in interpreter on MonoVM. #60338
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • issue-22928 Add ImmutableArray Span-based APIs #61196
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Use SIMD operations in InitBlkUnroll/CopyBlkUnroll and increase unroll limit up to 128 bytes #61030
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-author-action, 7.0.0
  • Reenable Mono runtime tests on PRs #62437
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • HTTP/3: QPACK decoder performance #62470
    area-System.Net.Http
